item.title: From Lecture Halls to Launchpads: Rethinking the University as a Startup Studio
item.description: Todays universities are factories of conformity, teaching the past to prepare students to work for someone elses future. Its time for a new model: invention-driven universities where every student leaves with their own brand, app, or businessâ€”and a real chance to thrive.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
